com.shamanland.fab

Class ScrollDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener
      • com.shamanland.fab.ScrollDetector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.GestureDetector.OnDoubleTapListener, android.view.GestureDetector.OnGestureListener, android.view.View.OnTouchListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShowHideOnScroll

    public abstract class ScrollDetector
extends android.view.GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener
implements android.view.View.OnTouchListener
    Implementation of View.OnTouchListener which uses GestureDetector to recognize scrolling events.
